scripts.compile: command -v xelatex && xelatex -halt-on-error -interaction=nonstopmode -shell-escape -output-directory=build src/main.tex || ./scripts/show-error.sh "Cannot find xelatex"
scripts.bib: command -v biber && biber build/main || ./scripts/show-error.sh "Cannot find biber"
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bib && npm run compile && npm run compile && mv build/main.pdf document/production.pdf || ./scripts/show-error.sh "Cannot build document"
scripts.build-dev: npm run compile && npm run bib && npm run compile && npm run compile && mv build/main.pdf document/development.pdf || ./scripts/show-error.sh "Cannot build document"
scripts.fast-rebuild: npm run compile && mv build/main.pdf document/development.pdf || ./scripts/show-error.sh "Cannot build document"
